author: cerminar
body:
#### PR description:

The PR fixes the scale problems of L1 EG objects in HGC reported in:

https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/L1TriggerUpgrades/385/1/1/1/1/1/1/1/1.html

#### PR validation:

title: Fix L1T Phase2 EG scale
